content: Become the living embodiment of your favorite fire type Pokemon by jumping into this Pokemon Charizard lounger. This zany and incredibly comfy getup comes with cool accents like a face sewn onto the hood and imposing 5 foot wide wings sewn onto the arms.

Clothing of the future monitors ambient data & self-adjusts its 12v 360/full-torso heated liner. Set & Forget or use a hidden button, Apple Watch or Siri to adjust the hoodie at your ideal temperature. Charge Devices. Water Resistant. No Bulky Coats!

Life on the road can be rough, unless you have the Migrator Off-Road Camper hitched to your ride. Despite its compact size, this rugged camper will provide you with all the comforts of home – from cozy sleeping quarters to a versatile little kitchen.

Get a peek at the future of construction by seeing the Aist Humanoid construction robot in action. The Humanoid Robot HRP-5P Prototype is designed with the intention of eventually taking the place of humans in hazardous working conditions.

If you fancy yourself a gearhead or audiophile, this stunning Porsche 911 soundbar is a must-have for your home. Modeled after the original tailpipe and rear silencer of the 911 GT3, it boasts a 2.1 virtual surround system for incredible crispness and high fidelity sound.

Centro Stile and Lamborghini Squadra Corse have joined forces to bring you the stunning Lamborghini SC18 Alston. Designed to conquer the track, this jaw-dropping ride comes equipped with a powerful V12 that delivers 770 hp for a top speed of 210 mph.

It is said that whoever unleashes the wrath of the rubber band machine gun will henceforth wield unquestionable power over the vast realm of Middle Cubicle Earth. With a 672 shot capacity, this fully automatic machine gun will have you feeling like a rubber band Rambo.

Ski better than you ever thought possible by augmenting your puny human body with the Roam exoskeleton skiing suit. This high-tech apparatus will ensure you have greater stability, help reduce fatigue, and boost quad strength for greater control and stronger turns.

Make your already incredible day at Magic Kingdom even more magical for your little princess with this carriage stroller all-day rental. Instead of a plain old stroller, you’ll get to transport your little girl inside this fairy tale inspired Cinderella themed carriage.

The Audi e-tron GT is the sleek concept ride from the luxury car maker that is looking to dethrone Tesla’s Model S. The eco-friendly e-tron boasts 590 horsepower and will be able to go from 0 to 62 miles per hour in just 3.5 seconds.

Get a little frisky at lunchtime by blasting your food with your favorite condiment using this eggplant sauce dispenser bottle. This saucy little bottle is made from a very squishy BPA-free food-safe silicone that makes dispensing incredibly easy.

You man not be a genius, billionaire, or playboy but at least you can look like Iron Man by dressing up in this life size suit. It is composed of over a dozen independent wearable parts and features an integrated sound and lighting system for added authenticity.

Keep your pint-sized gamer cozy while they play using this adorable little Kirby inhale big plush cushion. This officially licensed and brilliantly designed cushion provides the ideal place to rest your noggin while you sleep , game, or are just lounging around.

Fend off any would be assaulter that comes your way by throwing a fist full of pocket sand! Popularized by King of The Hill’s Dale Gribble, each tactical drawstring cotton pouch comes loaded with two 1 oz. baggies of top quality granules of deterrence.

Venture off the beaten path without forgoing the comforts of home by hitching the Romotow Caravan to your trusty ride. It offers 290 square feet of living space and a bold rotating design that turns the U-shaped outer shell into a cozy little deck area.

There’s no better proof that we’re living in the future than this all electric Corvette C7. Built by Genovation – the green car company – this modified Corvette comes with a 700 horsepower electric motor that can propel this tire burning supercar to over 200 miles per hour!

Transform your favorite liquor into the legendary Green Fairy that was so cherished by 19th century writers and artists with this Absinthe making kit. It includes everything you’ll require to concoct this now legendary drink – minus the notorious neurotoxins.

Microsoft is giving back to its loyal followers by giving a lucky few of them the opportunity to rock this stylish Windows 95 sweater. This geeky piece of soft wear sports the iconic and colorful logo of the widely popular Windows 95 operating system.

Kick your BBQ game up a notch by charring your meats to perfection on the Argentinian Gaucho grill. This masterfully hand-built stainless steel wood fire grill features a high-powered gas starter and a 30″ spoked wheel so that you can easily lower and raise the rack.

Enjoying healthy farm-fresh foods is now more convenient than ever when you sign up for Farmbox Direct – the organic produce delivery service! You’ll be able to customize the size and contents of your box so that you get just what you’re craving.

titleEN: Knight Rider K.I.T.T. USB Car Charger
content: Keep your electronic devices powered with help from your favorite artificially intelligent electronic computer module by using this Knight Rider K.I.T.T. USB car charger. It features lights that sync up to its audio so it appears as if K.I.T.T. is right there with you!

The Ford noise cancelling dog house will finally give your canine a sanctuary from fireworks, thunder, and other scary loud noises.This swanky pet pad is constructed utilizing acoustic isolation panels, anti-vibration block risers, and soundproof ventilation.

The Guardian XO Max exoskeleton suit is looking to revolutionize the construction field by greatly improving a worker’s strength and endurance. This game-changing suit will give the wearer the capacity to perform feats like easily lifting 200 pounds.

If you loved playing Battleship as a kid, the grownup you will absolutely love this Sink Or Shoot drinking game. Like its non-alcoholic counterpart, the aim is to sink your opponent’s shot glass filled wooden ships. Each time you guess a coordinate correctly, your opponent drinks.

This blazing beats sound reactive fireplace will turn your outdoor patio into your home’s ultimate hangout spot after the sun goes down. Each song’s unique sound waves cause variations in air pressure that create the illusion the flames are dancing to the beat of your music.

Make your nightly walks with Rex more entertaining for yourself by heading out of the house with this dazzling lightsaber dog leash. This creatively designed leash makes it appear like you’re walking your doggy using Darth Vader’s iconic red lightsaber.

As far as 1980s Toyota pickups go, this custom ride is probably the coolest one around. This 1983 pickup truck was customized to look exactly like the yellow Pizza Planet pickup from the first Toy Story movie – making this the ultimate collectible for any fan of the film series.

If you’re on-the-go this phone charging wallet is the perfect solution for keeping your electronic gadgets juiced up. This elegant bi-fold wallet is crafted from black leather and is equipped with a removable 2,500 mAh battery that will fit comfortably into a credit card slot.

Multiply the fun and excitement of one of your favorite games by stepping into this giant inflatable foosball field. This massive field comes lined with a big bouncy border, features two built-in goal posts, and is large enough to host a five-on-five game.

titleEN: Six Foot Light Show Bubble Aquarium
content: Fill your little one’s bedroom with whimsy and color by adding some ambiance with this six foot light show bubble aquarium. It features an integrated motor that generates a vertical stream of bubbles that send little colorful artificial fish floating up and down.

Get any cocktail you crave on demand by upgrading your home bar with the automated robotic cocktail maker. Simply choose one of the over 2,000 preloaded recipes on the Barsys app and Barsys will take care of the rest.

Heat up your year with some of the Big Apple’s sexiest cab drivers by hanging up the NYC Taxi Drivers Calendar. The calendar spotlights twelve scorching hot New York City cabbies in silly and humorous poses that’ll keep you smiling all year round.

Braving the frigid winter weather just got a whole lot easier with these nose warmers. These ultra fashionable and comfy accessories conveniently strap behind the ears and are available in a range of fabrics like faux fur, animal print, and fleece.

Create your very own destruction derby by smashing these crash and rebuild monster trucks! The set comes with everything you’ll need to build some pint-sized monster trucks that you can crash into each other over and over again!

Keep track of time at a galactic level with this incredible moving planetarium watch from Van Cleef & Arpels. Instead of hands denoting the hours and minutes, it features six of our solar system’s planets rotating around a miniature version of the sun in real time.

Transform any stretch of highway into your own home away from home by hitching the Droplet off-grid teardrop trailer to your ride. This all-season insulated trailer, comes with ample storage space, a self standing solar panel, kitchen space, and a comfy queen mattress.

Keep the dry and arid climate from tearing into your sinuses by placing this Godzilla diffuser humidifier in your room. The clever design creates the illusion that the king of all monsters is releasing a cloud of smoke from his mighty mouth.

If you fancy yourself a carnivore, the APL Beef Club is just for you! Upon attaining your membership you’ll be able to attain up to 40 pounds of antibiotic-free, butchered-on-sight “Flinstonian Rib” tomahawk steaks that are dry-aged in an environmental chamber.

Kick your fashion game up a notch by strutting your stuff in these spectacular Maison Margiela black reflective boots. These stunning boots feature an impossible-to-ignore reflective iridescent design that makes the boots change colors depending on the angle.

In these modern times an eggplant is not just an eggplant. This stress reducing squish toy is perfect for the frisky millennial to keep calm at all times. Simply beat that eggplant like it owes you money whenever you feel your anger rising!

Create a magically delightful ambiance by turning on Hagrid’s lantern. This officially-licensed human-sized lantern features screen accurate detailing and emits a soft yet comforting flickering yellow glow, just like Hagrid’s giant one.

Take home security to new heights by protecting the perimeter with this drone home security system. The high-tech system combines strategically placed outdoor sensors along with a flying camera so that you can know what’s going on around your entire home.

Make your house feel a little more like home by accenting it with a variety of personalized face cushions. Simply submit a photo of your beautiful mug and you will receive a soft and cuddly head sized cushion delivered right to your your doorstep.

Keep your outdoor patio comfy and stylish with this gravity swing sofa. This unique and versatile piece can either be hung and used a luxurious swinging sofa that relaxes you with its gentle rocking motion or as a regular yet fashionable outdoor sofa.

This neat little Apple watch iPod case will give your fancy smartwatch some old school flair that will turn heads everywhere you take it. It allows you to use your watch like an old school iPod – complete with the classic menu wheel!

Keep each one of your hits incredibly smooth and satisfying by smoking your dank buds from these freezable glass pipes. Simply fill the pipe up with water and freeze it so that when the smoke passes through the frozen chamber it’s instantly cooled.

titleEN: Real Pizza Slices Encased In Lucite
content: Ensure you’re never without your favorite food by proudly displaying one of these real pizza slices encased in lucite inside your home. Available in either classic cheese or pepperoni, each slice is immortalized in a block of a transparent lucite.

Help keep water costs down by upgrading to the Cirrus aromatherapy shower head. The set includes the compact Cirrus spa that’s designed to purify your tap water and a sleek shower head that increases pressure while reducing water consumption by up to 75%.

titleEN: KFC Fried Chicken Scented Fire Logs
content: Keep your home smelling finger-licking good by lighting up a few of these KFC fried chicken scented fire logs. Made from 100% recycled materials, each five pound log will fill your with the sweet sweet aroma of the Colonel’s 11 secret herbs and spices.

90 degree angled homes are so last century. Artists Alex Schweder and Ward Shelley have taken the architectural world by storm with their eye-catching tilting house. This habitable sculpture measures 44 feet by 8 feet and can rotate and tilt on its own massive column.

The absolutely stunning solid diamond ring is both a diamond and a ring! Auctioned off at an event to benefit an AIDS/HIV nonprofit, this gorgeous piece was crafted from an enormous rock whose interior was cut utilizing a micrometer-thick water jet with a laser beam inside.

Help keep your ride looking like new by shielding it from the elements using this remote control automatic car cover. This convenient add-on mounts discreetly onto the roof of your car so that you can easily cover it to protect it from UV rays, rain, and snow.

Happy Holiday Anxiety… VEGAN AF CBD gummies are taken by animal lovers who want a healthy alternative for anxiety. These new VEGAN versions of Sunday Scaries are perfect daily gummies to keep you relaxed & focused. Enjoy code “Vegan10” for 10% off!

titleEN: Rick And Morty Anatomy Park Operation
content: Help Rick keep Ruben’s life hanging in the balance by besting the competition in Rick and Morty Anatomy Park Operation. Your mission is to keep Ruben from meeting his end by removing the park’s anatomical attractions like Bladder Falls and Pirates of the Pancreas.

This amazing mathematical shape has the property of constant width, just like a sphere. It is generally thought only a sphere has constant width, but that is not the case. Each sculpture is precision machined from solid metal blocks.

The Loon luxury charter yacht aims to put the yachting experience within your reach. This opulent vessel can house up to 11 lucky guests and comes loaded with insane features ranging from a deployable water slide, a collection of Seadoo jetskis and even a swimming pool!

As far as treehouses go, the Pinecone Treehouse is one of the most unique and stunning ones out there. Nestled deep in the forest on the outskirts of Oakland, this stunning abode features a pinecone-like shape composed of steel and California redwood.

Amaze your muggle friends with your wizardly prowess with the Wingardium Leviosa floating feather. This officially licensed goody lets you use Hermoine’s wand to magically make the fluffy feather levitate – making it the perfect addition for any Harry Potter themed cosplay.

For the first time ever the largest collection of pre-prohibition whiskey is going up for auction. This rare collection was discovered concealed behind a 10-bolt vault door and contains over 40 cases of bourbon and rye whiskey from the early twentieth century.

BigRep is taking the bike world by storm with the unveiling of Nera – the world’s first 3D printed electric motorcycle. Apart from its 3D construction, this eye-catching ride boasts game-changing features like airless tires and forkless steering.

The Earthroamer luxury overland vehicle is your ticket to solar powered off-grid living without having to forgo the comforts of home. It boasts a 6.7L V8 turbo engine, massive fuel and water tanks, a hydraulic suspension system, and an intelligently designed luxury interior.

Make every bathroom trip one to remember by decorating with this amazing 3D shark sea floor mural. This striking decal creates the illusion that you have a fully grown shark swimming directly below your bathroom floor.

Classic cars and new technology join forces to bring you a ride unlike any other – the Charge Electric 1960s Ford Mustang. Each classic Mustang has been completely restored and improved with modern technology without losing the classic look or feel of the iconic muscle car.

Famed pastry chef and father of the Cronut, Dominique Ansel is giving us all one more reason to look forward to Xmas morning thanks to his Christmas Morning Cereal. This savory treat contains clumps of crispy puffed rice slathered in caramelized milk chocolate.

The Azaris Advanced off-road vehicle is the 6-wheeled ATV that will turn Earth’s most rugged terrain into your personal playground. Instead of relying on a driveshaft, it uses hydraulically-powered hub-mounted motors that allow for phenomenal handling in extreme terrain.

The perfect holiday gifts for your everyday carry.  Functionality that compliments your daily routine. Hammerstone is everything you need and nothing you don’t. Get free shipping through Tuesday with code FREESHIP

Set yourself apart from the millions of homes filled with IKEA furniture by decorating with this giant talon table. This imposing piece is composed of a painted brass top that sits atop an eye-catching hand painted bronze base designed like a massive talon – complete with claws.

Send your taste buds on a wild ride by quenching your thirst with a nice glass of Dirt Soda Pop. This interestingly refreshing pop combines the flavors of pure cane sugar along with an earthy mineral taste that hits you with a bold and sweet flavor.

Take the sport of paintball to new heights by getting behind the wheel of one of these motorized paintball tanks. Mounted with a paintball marker of your choosing, you’ll be able to experience an all-out scaled down tank battle – where getting shot in the face is guaranteed!

Get serious about your milk and cookies by upping your snacking game with the official Oreo dunking set. This snacktime must-have features a handy cookie case that allows you to easily stack your cookies until you’re ready to dunk them in using the handy tongs.

Exceed your weekly sugar quota in one sitting by topping off your not-so-balanced breakfast with a big bowl of Sour Patch Kids cereal. Just like their gummy counterparts, these delectable little Sour Patch Kids start off sour and then turn sweet.

Designed to conquer some of the most unforgiving landscapes Mother Nature has to offer, the Techno-Impulse Rocket Z SUV will get you where you need to go. This 4×4 boasts a 100 horsepower diesel engine in addition to colossal tires that’ll tackle any terrain.

This invisible car lift revolutionizes parking spaces – from the resolution of parking-related problems, they create shapes and spaces that complement society’s new lifestyles. Protection, functionality and aesthetics to treasure your car.

Keep your gums and pearly whites healthy and radiant with the Bristl phototherapy electric toothbrush. This high-tech brush comes fitted with a near infrared light that reduces gum inflammation in addition to a near UV light that safely kills bacteria and whitens your teeth.

Keep your furry friend by your side all night without losing valuable mattress space by placing him on the pet’s bedside bunk. It comes fitted with two steps so your doggy can safely climb up and down and can support up to 60 pounds.

This highly detailed, metallic finished, auto-open with built-in Jarvis sound track Iron Man MK-7 helmet is a full size adult and kid costume helmet but also makes a great display piece for any geeky collection.

Jeep is making waves with their announcement of the Gladiator pick-up truck – the first truck Jeep has released in nearly thirty years! This off-road capable 4×4 features the open air feel of a Wrangler combined with the best-in-class towing and payload.

If plain old jigsaws pose no challenge to you anymore, try your hand at this color changing jigsaw puzzle. As if a 1,000-piece puzzle weren’t difficult enough, each piece comes with an iridescent coating that makes the actual color of them incredibly hard to make out.

Drop the keys! Meet this new genius way to enjoy shotgunning beer that prevents beer spray and sharp edges! The shotgun shell puts other beer openers to shame! Just slide your beer in, press to puncture, and pass around the fun!

The world’s most private island resort is so secluded there’s zero chance of you seeing another guest while you’re there. This little piece of paradise is surrounded by the lush warm waters of the widest and most picturesque section of the Belize Barrier Reef.

Hide a secret room in your home with this bookshelf that folds open to reveal a secret passageway. Regardless of whether it leads to the Batcave or just the laundry room, these secret passageway bookshelves are a must-have for any home.

Experience the beauty of the Sheshan Mountain range in total comfort by booking your stay at the luxurious Shanghai Wonderland hotel. It’s built into the side of an old rock quarry and boasts 337 gorgeous suites that offer breathtaking views of the landscape below.

No matter where you are heading out to, the DeepCover Off-Body EDC system will work seamlessly with whatever bag you use everyday in order to add an impressive layer of functionality with minimal impact to your daily routine.

Climb aboard the Hyper-Sub speedboat and submarine and you’ll be the undisputed master of the high seas. It can be launched in only 3 feet of water, reach a top speed of 35 miles per hour, and it boasts a large dry chamber that allows you to dive deep down below.

Show the world how much your feline family member means to you by immortalizing him with one of these personalized 3D cat portraits. Each masterfully made portrait will depict your kitty in stunning detail for an incredibly realistic appearance.

titleEN: Beauty And The Beast Lumiere Light
content: Bring intimacy and whimsy to your next romantic meal by letting this Beauty and the Beast Lumiere light provide the quaint ambient lighting. It emits a soft candle-like glow and is powered by 3 AAA batteries – making it ideal for taking on-the-go.

Experience the lighting power of the universe’s ultimate weapon by turning on this Thanos Infinity Gauntlet mood lamp. Styled like Thanos’s mighty weapon, every LED infinity stone embedded in the gauntlet comes alive and emits a cool colored glow.

This personalized face gift wrapping paper will ensure your present looks like most appealing gift under the tree. Simply upload the image of your choice and receive either a one meter, two meter, or three meter roll plastered with your lovely mug.

Make your artwork edgier than ever by bringing out the worst in you with these offensive crayons. Each box contains 24 crayons with totally inappropriate names like “privilege white”, “insufferable vegan green”, “travel ban brown”, and “miscarriage maroon”.

titleEN: Nintendo Super Mario Light Up Wreath
content: Ring in the holidays with a geeky twist by upgrading your rustic wreath to this high-tech Nintendo Super Mario light up wreath. The wreath is decked out in retro 8-bit styled graphics and accented with 5 green LEDs that will blink on and off intermittently.

Get serious about your outdoor cooking by upgrading your puny grill to the Mallmann’s artisanal hanging grill. Inspired by traditional Argentine grilling, the original and versatile allows you to sear, simmer, smoke, and roast your juicy cuts all at once.

Ensure you live to see another day when the apocalypse inevitably arrives by hunkering down in a Vivos xPoint survival bunker. Each bunker offers 2,200 square feet of space and can be fully customized to your preferences for maximum comfort.

Walking the thin line between naughty and nice is easier than ever when you show up dressed in this naughty/nice list sweater. The eye-catching design lets you flip-flop between the naughty and nice list depending on your current mood.

Much like the larger-than-life characters this eye-catching timepiece is based on, this G-Shock Transformers watch is much more than meets the eye because the watch comes with a transformable Optimus Prime base that you can display like an action figure.

Working in damp and water soaked job sites is about to get a lot easier thanks to the Nautilus underwater power drill. The innovative design boasts an impeller and channel that runs around the motor, which sucks away all debris so you’re visibility isn’t blocked.

The Cray-1 was the first commercially successful supercomputer. This surface mounted integrated circuit was originally part of the Cray-1 Supercomputer installed at the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory and can now be yours.

Enjoy the company of a friendly face during long road trips by keeping your car smelling springtime fresh with a personalized face air freshener. They come in sets of 3 and are available in pleasant scents like “candy cane”, “island breeze”, and “bacon”.

Experience all the action of the most gnarly weather phenomenon known to man by playing the Sharknado virtual reality game: Eye of the Storm. You’ll be placed in right in the middle of all the chaos in cities like Los Angeles, Kansas, and New York City.

Keep your favorite person close by every night – even if they’re not there – by having their gorgeous mug made into a cool and comfy pillow case. All you need to do is upload a picture of the person you want to have emblazoned all over your pillow case.

titleEN: The Magic Letter To Santa Mailbox
content: Keep the illusion of Jolly ol’ Saint Nick alive and well in your home with help from the magic letter to Santa mailbox. Once the letters are placed inside, the mailbox makes a magical sound and when opened again, the mailbox will be magically empty!
